<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning.</strong> The World Cheese Awards just <a href="https://link.morningbrew.com/click/25672889.0/aHR0cHM6Ly9lZGl0aW9uLmNubi5jb20vdHJhdmVsL2FydGljbGUvd29ybGRzLWJlc3QtY2hlZXNlLWF3YXJkLTIwMjEvaW5kZXguaHRtbD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/5f10d6a212c71038741b0759B409a013c?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">dropped</a> and whiz got friggin’ robbed again. A soft goat cheese from Spanish artisan cheesemaker “Quesos y Besos” (Cheeses and Kisses) got the nod for first place, and it's apparently so good that one judge said, “I just wanted to go to bed with it.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">—<em>Max Knoblauch, Matty Merritt, Neal Freyman</em></p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENTERTAINMENT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/a-disney-subscriber-slump-may-point-to-a-supersaturated-streaming-market?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Disney+ Growth Looking Like
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/a-disney-subscriber-slump-may-point-to-a-supersaturated-streaming-market?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="A drawing of a horse, becoming increasingly child-like from left to right." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/862f402ae93b3e076e6a3f2211e2049f5fdee1ac-739x500.png?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Imgflip</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Baby Yoda’s not doing great in his toddler stage: Disney shares sagged as much as 9% Thursday after the company posted lower-than-expected earnings Wednesday and announced an <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/11/10/business/disney-plus-growth-slows.html?partner=slack&smid=sl-share" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">abrupt slowdown</a> of new subscribers to Disney+.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">After adding 12-, 9-, and 21 million subscribers in the previous three quarters, analysts assumed the Dory avatar profiles would keep flowing for the growing streaming service, predicting an additional 10 million new subs. Instead, Disney+ added only 2.1 million subscriptions in the latest quarter.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The new figures bring Disney+ total subs to 118.1 million, behind Netflix’s 213.5 million.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Now, it’ll be an uphill battle for Disney to meet its target of 230–260 million subscribers by 2024.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Don’t expect fewer <em>Loki</em> eps though: CEO Bob Chapek told investors that it’s still full steam ahead. Disney will increase its investment in the streaming service beyond the projected $8–$9 billion it announced last December.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The subscriber slowdown isn’t a Disney exclusive</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It appears as though the US streaming market has almost reached saturation.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Netflix has added just 88,000 subscribers in the US and Canada this year (down from 6 million in 2020 and 3 million in 2019)—and that’s in the era of its biggest show ever, </span><span><em>Squid Game</em></span><span>, AND the reign of Giuseppe and Jürgen on </span><span><em>Bake Off</em></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>HBO Max added 570,000 new US subscribers last quarter, down from 2.4 million and 2.8 million in the previous two.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>As for Peacock? Comcast doesn’t even want to talk about it.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">What to do? Some analysts say Disney needs a hard reset and to look beyond its franchises like Marvel, which require more money and time to produce. Streaming is a quantity-over-quality game, and while Disney+ programming is positively received by subscribers, the streamer lags behind competitors in terms of its number of highly rated shows according to a <a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/story/disney-may-have-a-structural-problem-in-streaming-analyst-warns-11634577368?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Barclays analysis</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">We’ll find out more about the streaming service’s new content slate today, as Disney celebrates its streamer’s second anniversary with <a href="https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-day-2021-11?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Disney+ Day</a>.—<em>MK</em></p>
</div>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GEOPOLITICS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/belarus-president-threatens-to-withhold-gas-supplies-as-border-crisis-escalates?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
All's Not Quiet on the Eastern Front
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/belarus-president-threatens-to-withhold-gas-supplies-as-border-crisis-escalates?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Migrants at the Belarusian-Polish border in the Grodno region" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/40cef552e9f7c910a641f84a753d9ad7f58118aa-1024x683.jpg?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>LEONID SHCHEGLOV/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">ICYMI, there’s a <a href="https://www.gzeromedia.com/the-eus-two-big-eastern-problem-s?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">crisis</a> unfolding on the Belarusian-Polish border, and now the Belarusian president is threatening to stop gas flows to the EU if Western powers slap more sanctions on his country.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory: </strong>Thousands of migrants, mostly from Middle Eastern countries like Iraq and Syria, have amassed at the frigid Belarus-Poland border in an attempt to get into EU states like Poland and Lithuania. 12,000 Polish troops have been <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/belarus-threaten-europe-gas/2021/11/11/970c725c-42df-11ec-9404-50a28a88b9cd_story.html?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">deployed</a> to block them from entering.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The EU is accusing Belaurisan President Alexander Lukashenko of using these migrants as geopolitical pawns in yet another attempt to destabilize the bloc.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Lukashenko has been called “Europe’s last dictator.” He runs an authoritarian regime, held a fraudulent election last year to stay in power, and in May effectively hijacked an EU commercial jet in order to arrest a dissident journalist.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The EU responded to that hijacking with a barrage of sanctions, which it threatened to widen after Lukashenko’s latest border provocations.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>A gas supply squeeze is the <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/57496ab1-db76-4acc-b1e8-c60e0c05df66?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">last thing</a> Europe needs right now. Gas prices on the continent have skyrocketed this year, but 20% of its gas supplies arrive via Belarus from Russia.—<em>NF</em></p>
</div>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRANSPORTATION
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/infrastructure-bill-includes-law-that-aims-to-end-drunk-driving?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Drunk Driving on Notice
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When Biden signs the $1 trillion infrastructure bill on Monday, he’ll be putting into effect the government’s <a href="https://www.autoblog.com/2021/11/10/drunk-driving-car-technology-infrastructure-bill/?guccounter=1&guce_referrer=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZW5nYWRnZXQuY29tL2NvbmdyZXNzLW1hbmRhdGUtYW50aS1kcnVuay1kcml2aW5nLXRlY2hub2xvZ3ktY2Fycy0yMDE4MjAxMjAuaHRtbA&guce_referrer_sig=AQAAAF8m5Xx9b3w_RYS8pjeR-_-OuvSY-d1dFlklHYQsPhUc68Wh10xGZZKiPCSnZIUBSvN2zqLf_w16wKsF3Q1DqYkCqdKv3DaOPY26AsrknHi7SoqmjNZndw1mFGza2liq61VxswUEvpeaoORTicxr7q97xR2lya1iGdlrEi9PP5Yh" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">biggest push</a> yet to end drunk driving.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And it’s not just a call for more corny PSAs. By 2026, automakers will be required to install technology that detects and prevents intoxicated drivers from hitting the road.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Around 10,000 people are killed in drunk driving accidents every year, making up about 30% of all traffic fatalities. This plan seeks to reduce those deaths by 9,400 people every year.<em> </em>But how? The Department of Transportation still has to decide what the best tech is to stop drunk driving.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Some options in development include discrete sensors placed in cars that would measure the alcohol level in drivers’ blood or breath.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Other possible solutions include cameras similar to ones currently used by carmakers like GM to monitor driver attentiveness when driver assistance features are in use.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line:</strong> People definitely have <a href="https://gizmodo.com/infrastructure-bills-drunk-driving-tech-mandate-leaves-1848026588?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">privacy concerns</a> over the tech, but anti-drunk driving activists are praising the new rule. Alex Otte, president of Mothers Against Drunk Driving, called the mandate the “single most important legislation” passed in the advocacy group’s history.<em>—MM</em></p>
</div>

<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Dreaming of the big time stocks you shoulda-coulda-woulda invested in...but didn’t?</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://link.morningbrew.com/click/25672889.?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Motley Fool</a> works to identify potentially massive tech trends right before they take off, and with Apple making all of their iPhones 5G compatible, The Motley Fool believes 5G tech has reached a pivotal inflection point. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">This means it might be poised to explode with opportunity, making 5G a potentially</strong> <strong style="color:#000">great place to invest $1k right now.</strong> With past picks like Tesla and Netflix, The Motley Fool’s got a strong rep for picking tech stocks right before they gain serious mainstream traction.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And while others are eyeing obvious picks like 5G providers, The Motley Fool’s <em>Stock Advisor</em> has homed in on a lesser-known stock that serves 5G tech in a significant, barely-replicable way. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Want their pick? <a href="https://link.morningbrew.com/click/25672889.?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Get its name, plus two other recs, *and*</a> <a href="https://link.morningbrew.com/click/25672889.?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Stock Advisor’s</em></a> <a href="https://link.morningbrew.com/click/25672889.?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">report on 5G here</a>.</p>

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/key-performance-indicators-november-12?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">

Key Performance Indicators

<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/11/11/key-performance-indicators-november-12?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">

</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">

<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>The number of managerial and professional staff at Yale University has grown at 3x the rate of the undergraduate student body over the last two decades, and now is <a href="https://yaledailynews.com/blog/2021/11/10/reluctance-on-the-part-of-its-leadership-to-lead-yales-administration-increases-by-nearly-50-percent/?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">greater than the size</a> of the undergrad population, per the Yale Daily News. There are even more administrators than a cappella groups.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>“Making history in the world of food.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">DJ Khaled’s new business venture is as large as his “featured” credits. The producer launched chicken wing delivery startup <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-11-11/dj-khaled-s-another-wing-ghost-kitchen-chain-offers-jet-ski-delivery?srnd=premium" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Another Wing</a> in five countries across three continents—one of the biggest restaurant launches ever. You can even get your wings delivered via Jet Ski in Miami.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>How NFTs create value. (<a href="https://hbr.org/2021/11/how-nfts-create-value?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Harvard Business Review</a>)</p>
</div>

<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Since at least 2010, companies have been working on some form of technology that allows shoppers to “try on” clothes from the comfort of their homes. Retailers and tech companies from Warby Parker to Pinterest have latched onto the idea of solving the challenge via a mixture of augmented reality, artificial intelligence, cameras, and other forms of sensors.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px"><li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Fast-forward to 2021, and the need to solve this challenge is stronger than ever before. </span><span><em>And</em></span><span> closer to being solved than ever before.</span>
</li></ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In this guide, we’ll walk you through the key components, players, challenges, use cases, and developments in virtual fitting room technology.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">How many triangles can you find? </p>

style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAfter adding 12-, 9-, and 21 million subscribers in the previous three quarters, analysts assumed the Dory avatar profiles would keep flowing for the growing streaming service, predicting an additional 10 million new subs. Instead, Disney+ added only 2.1 million subscriptions in the latest quarter.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe new figures bring Disney+ total subs to 118.1 million, behind Netflix’s 213.5 million.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eNow, it’ll be an uphill battle for Disney to meet its target of 230–260 million subscribers by 2024.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eDon’t expect fewer \u003cem\u003eLoki\u003c/em\u003e eps though: CEO Bob Chapek told investors that it’s still full steam ahead. Disney will increase its investment in the streaming service beyond the projected $8–$9 billion it announced last December.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe subscriber slowdown isn’t a Disney exclusive\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt appears as though the US streaming market has almost reached saturation.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eNetflix has added just 88,000 subscribers in the US and Canada this year (down from 6 million in 2020 and 3 million in 2019)—and that’s in the era of its biggest show ever, \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cem\u003eSquid Game\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e, AND the reign of Giuseppe and Jürgen on \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cem\u003eBake Off\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHBO Max added 570,000 new US subscribers last quarter, down from 2.4 million and 2.8 million in the previous two.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAs for Peacock? Comcast doesn’t even want to talk about it.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhat to do? Some analysts say Disney needs a hard reset and to look beyond its franchises like Marvel, which require more money and time to produce. Streaming is a quantity-over-quality game, and while Disney+ programming is positively received by subscribers, the streamer lags behind competitors in terms of its number of highly rated shows according to a \u003ca href=\"https://www.marketwatch.com/story/disney-may-have-a-structural-problem-in-streaming-analyst-warns-11634577368?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eBarclays analysis\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWe’ll find out more about the streaming service’s new content slate today, as Disney celebrates its streamer’s second anniversary with \u003ca href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-day-2021-11?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eDisney+ Day\u003c/a\u003e.—\u003cem\u003eMK\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe EU is accusing Belaurisan President Alexander Lukashenko of using these migrants as geopolitical pawns in yet another attempt to journalist.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe EU responded to that hijacking with a barrage of sanctions, which it By 2026, automakers will be required to install technology that detects and prevents intoxicated drivers from hitting the road.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAround 10,000 people are killed in drunk driving accidents every year, making up about 30% of all traffic fatalities. This plan seeks to reduce those deaths by 9,400 people every year.\u003cem\u003e \u003c/em\u003eBut how? The Department of Transportation still has to decide what the best tech is to stop drunk driving.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSome options in development include discrete sensors placed in cars that would measure the alcohol level in drivers’ blood or breath.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOther possible solutions include cameras similar to ones currently used by carmakers like GM to monitor driver attentiveness when driver assistance features are in use.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line:\u003c/strong\u003e People definitely have \u003ca href=\"https://gizmodo.com/infrastructure-bills-drunk-driving-tech-mandate-leaves-1848026588?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eprivacy concerns\u003c/a\u003e over the tech, but anti-drunk driving activists are praising the new rule. Alex Otte, president of Mothers Against Drunk Driving, called the mandate the “single most important legislation” passed in the advocacy group’s history.\u003cem\u003e—MM\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\"
